column1: #Text=Amon says : " It is time for you to be equalized . "
#Text=" Amon says : " I am the solution .
#Text=" Amon says : " I 'll take care of him .
#Text=Electrocute the box to knock her out before you open it .
#Text=" Amon says : " I thought I told you not to underestimate her .
#Text=" Mako says : " That sounds like Naga !
#Text=" Mako says : " Give her some space !

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Korra Lin Beifong Mako Tenzin Antagonists Amon Equalists Lieutenant Tarrlok Yakone ( vision ) says : " Minor Aang ( flashback only ) Bailiff ( flashback only ) Council page Defense attorney ( flashback only ) Meelo Metalbender officer Metalbending Police Force Naga Oogi Pema Prosecution attorney ( flashback only ) Saikhan Sokka ( flashback only ) Toph ( flashback only ) " Shiro Shinobi says : " Lin Beifong has a sister .
#Text=After arriving in Zaofu , Korra met Opal , a new airbender whose mother is Lin 's estranged half - sister .
#Text=Suyin and her daughter welcomed Lin with open arms , but she wanted nothing to do with them .
#Text=Meanwhile , Zaheer infiltrated Air Temple Island , looking for the Avatar .
#Text=After battling with Kya , he escaped and is now a wanted man in Republic City .
